name: Blazing Limebolt
preparation: Fill a shaker with ice. Pour the gin and lime juice into the shaker. Shake well until chilled. Strain the mixture into a highball glass filled with ice. Top off with RedBull. Stir gently to combine.
backstory: Designed for those who enjoy a strong, stimulating kick with a bitter edge. The lime enhances the gin's botanicals, while RedBull provides an energetic twist.
